author: Tyler Colp
description: Last Epoch's head developer tries to assure fans things are going to be OK.
title: As Krafton evolves into an 'AI-first company', the boss of the recently acquired Last Epoch studio says he doesn't think the 'doom and gloom' is warranted

author: Christopher Livingston
description: Here's hoping the start of the next season will be more satisfying than the ending of the last season.
title: Alien: Earth renewed for Season 2, which is a great opportunity to make up for the disappointing end of Season 1

description: Trackpads could be the 21st century’s analog sticks.
title: I can't live without the Steam Deck's trackpads anymore, and I hope the Steam Controller forces the competition to adopt them

description: Power down at night, people.
title: 'Do people even go to the main menu anymore in their games?' The Outer Worlds 2's player-roasting main menu was almost sunk by console gamer habits

author: Andy Chalk
description: The Embracer-owned studio says it's restructuring "for our next generation," whatever that means.
title: For the third time this year, Crystal Dynamics is making layoffs: Nearly 30 people are being put out of work 'to optimize the continued development of our flagship Tomb Raider game'

description: "I think they were just unlucky."

description: We don't know what's going on, but something is definitely happening.

description: But I'll eat my words if that price tag is too high.
